game.name: Propaganda VS Zombies 2: Idle Deckbuilder
game.shortDescription: Fight through Hordes of Zombies while rescuing other survivors but every shot you make creates noise that attracts more Zombies towards you, your subordinates, and your Camp. Build your camp and make your decisions to assure the safety of your People!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight through Hordes of Zombies while rescuing other survivors but every shot you make creates noise that attracts more Zombies towards you, your subordinates, and your Camp. Build your camp and make your decisions to assure the safety of your People!
